#define wxWUDLC_BASECLASS   wxListCtrl
 

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum wxWebUpdateListCtrlFilter
 

The possible filters for the wxWebUpdateListCtrl.

Enumeration values:
wxWULCF_ONLY_OUTOFDATE  The listctrl will show only the local packages which are out-of-date or the remote packages which are not installed.
wxWULCF_ALL  The listctrl will show all the local & remote packages.
